title: U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE
ingredients: 1 yellow onion (peeled and chopped into 1/4 inch pieces)
2 cups canned low-sodium diced tomatoes (or fresh tomatoes)
1/4 cup Kalamata olives (or other Greek olives pitted and coarsely chopped)
directions: Put the skillet on the stove over high heat. When it is hot, add 1 1/2 teaspoons oil. https://www.myplate.gov/recipes/fish-spinach 1/5
